content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254692,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人サイゼルが持っていた本「ドラゴンパッチ６巻」と同じ本をサチコが持って来た","translatedEnglishLine":"Sachiko brought the same book 'Dragon Patch Volume 6' that the demon Lord Saizel had."},{"lineNumber":254693,"originalJapaneseLine":"１−６巻、全て・・オススメですよとランスに見せるが、いらん、おもんなさそう","translatedEnglishLine":"She showed volumes 1 to 6 to Rance recommending them, but he said no thanks, it looks boring."},{"lineNumber":254694,"originalJapaneseLine":"漫画なら読むが字だけなんてめんどい","translatedEnglishLine":"I'd read manga, but just text is too much hassle."},{"lineNumber":254695,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんなのどこがいいんだか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't see what's good about this..."},{"lineNumber":254696,"originalJapaneseLine":"すごくいいんです、ほんと最終巻がなかなか出ないのが辛い所です","translatedEnglishLine":"It's really good, it's just tough that the final volume hasn't been released yet."},{"lineNumber":254697,"originalJapaneseLine":"ファンの人だったら、どんな事をしても欲しいですよ","translatedEnglishLine":"If you're a fan, you'd want it no matter what."},{"lineNumber":254698,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむ・・魔人ハウゼルも欲しがるだろうか？","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... I wonder if the demon Lord Hauser would want it too?"},{"lineNumber":254699,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええ、もちろんです、あの人はマニアです、命を差し出しても欲しくなるはずですね","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, of course, he's a fanatic; he'd want it even if it cost his life."},{"lineNumber":254700,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":254701,"originalJapaneseLine":"という訳で俺様はここに来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"And that's why I have come here."},{"lineNumber":254702,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっぱり分かりませんと　誰かが言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone said, 'I don't understand at all.'"},{ "lineNumber":254703,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、そのドラゴンパッチを書いたドエススキーという作家が執筆活動か何かの","translatedEnglishLine":"So, the writer Doessky, who wrote Dragon Patch, is missing after going up this Hyper Building for some writing activity or something."},{"lineNumber":254704,"originalJapaneseLine":"為にこのハイパービルに登って行方不明になっているのだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"He went up this Hyper Building and disappeared,"},{"lineNumber":254705,"originalJapaneseLine":"そいつを見つけ出して、続きを書かせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to find him and make him write the continuation."},{"lineNumber":254706,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、それを読みたければ降伏しろと魔人ハウゼルを脅すのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then we threaten demon Lord Hauser to surrender if he wants to read it."},{"lineNumber":254707,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんなアホな・・とみんなバカにするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone scoffed, saying 'That's stupid...'"},{"lineNumber":254708,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコだけ、恐ろしい事を考える・・そんな事されたら従うしかないですよ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Only Sachiko thought something terrifying... If that happens, they'd have no choice but to obey..."},{"lineNumber":254709,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、北部の戦い","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the battle in the north."},{"lineNumber":254710,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図　リーザス１／合戦１　　現在地合戦マーカー：スケール前","translatedEnglishLine":"Map Lyzas 1 / Battle 1 - Current battle marker: In front of Scale."},{"lineNumber":254711,"originalJapaneseLine":"大規模では無いが、小競り合い程度の戦いが続いている","translatedEnglishLine":"It isn't large-scale, but small skirmishes continued."},{"lineNumber":254712,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は用事があるからと今日は戦いに参加していない","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and team didn't participate in the battle today, saying they had other matters."},{"lineNumber":254713,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんの為にきたのだあの男はと怒る兵士もいるとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Some soldiers were angry, asking, 'What did that man even come here for?'"},{"lineNumber":254714,"originalJapaneseLine":"エクスやハウレーンなどの戦い様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The battles involving Ex and Haureen, among others."},{"lineNumber":254715,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービルのとある一室でドエススキーを発見した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Doessky was found in a certain room in the Hyper Building."},{"lineNumber":254716,"originalJapaneseLine":"この高い部屋から見る景色、これが創作意欲をわくのだーとか","translatedEnglishLine":"He said the view from this high room inspires his creativity."},{"lineNumber":254717,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスもドエススキーもどちらも会った事を覚えていない","translatedEnglishLine":"Neither Rance nor Doessky remembered meeting each other."},{"lineNumber":254718,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコだけは覚えている、なんで二人とも忘れるんですか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Only Sachiko remembered. 'Why did you both forget...?'"},{"lineNumber":254719,"originalJapaneseLine":"この続きをかけ、今すぐ、明日までに","translatedEnglishLine":"Write the continuation, right now, by tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":254720,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理じゃ、いきなり何をいう","translatedEnglishLine":"Impossible, what are you suddenly saying?"},{"lineNumber":254721,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっと読者は楽しみにしていただうが、こんな世界だ、もう続きはかけない","translatedEnglishLine":"Sure, readers have been looking forward to it, but this is the world we live in; I can't write the rest anymore."},{"lineNumber":254722,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに・・・実は、いろいろやりすぎて風呂敷が畳めないのじゃ","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides... actually, I've done too much and can't wrap things up."},{"lineNumber":254723,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぶっちゃけ収拾が付かなくなったというか・・あははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Honestly, it's gotten out of control... haha."},{"lineNumber":254724,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいからかけ、かかねば殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"Just write it, or I'll kill you."},{"lineNumber":254725,"originalJapaneseLine":"３日後、戦争中であるが読書家の間にとある噂が駆け巡った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Three days later, even amid the war, a certain rumor spread among book lovers."},{"lineNumber":254726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドラゴンパッチ７巻」最終巻が緊急発売","translatedEnglishLine":"'Dragon Patch Volume 7' - the final volume - is released urgently."},{"lineNumber":254727,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな時期なので、世界最後の本になるかもしれないが、作者ががんばって出版した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of these times, it might be the last book in the world, but the author worked hard to publish it."},{"lineNumber":254728,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただし大量生産は出来ずに限定２００冊、同人的な販売となる。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it can't be mass-produced; only 200 limited copies will be sold fan-style."},{"lineNumber":254729,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸ月ＸＸ日、ＸＸＸＸにて作者自ら手渡しで販売。","translatedEnglishLine":"On XX month XX day, it will be sold hand-to-hand by the author at XXXX."},{"lineNumber":254730,"originalJapaneseLine":"その日","translatedEnglishLine":"That day."},{"lineNumber":254731,"originalJapaneseLine":"場所は当然魔軍占領地でなくリーザス軍が管理化の奥地","translatedEnglishLine":"The location was, of course, not in demon territory but deep inside territory controlled by the Lyzas army."},{"lineNumber":254732,"originalJapaneseLine":"多数のリーザス兵が待ち構える洞窟の奥地","translatedEnglishLine":"The back of a cave guarded by many Lyzas soldiers."},{"lineNumber":254733,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア、マリスも居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria and Maris were also there."},{"lineNumber":254734,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ハウゼルが来た時に捕まえる為に結界志木まで用意している","translatedEnglishLine":"They had even prepared barrier talismans to catch demon Lord Hauser if he came."},{"lineNumber":254735,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、さすがに来ないだろうと指揮官達は言う","translatedEnglishLine":"But the commanders said, 'He probably won't come.'"},{ "lineNumber":254736,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに３００人ほどが行列していた、並んでいるマニア達は周囲に","translatedEnglishLine":"About 300 people were already in line, and the maniacs standing there looked around."},{"lineNumber":254737,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス兵がいっぱいいて仰々しいのにびびる、何事だ・・何があるんだ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They're intimidated by the many Lyzas soldiers and the fuss around them. 'What's going on… what is this about...?'"},{"lineNumber":254738,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、何があろうと欲しいー","translatedEnglishLine":"But no matter what, I want it—"},{"lineNumber":254739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254740,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドエススキー、落ち込んでいる・・・うう、書かされてしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"Doessky was depressed... Ugh, I was forced to write it."},{"lineNumber":254741,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理矢理・・あんなのわしの作品じゃない、駄作だ、駄作だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Forced... That's not my work, it's a bad work, a bad work."},{"lineNumber":254742,"originalJapaneseLine":"破り捨てたい・・・ファンに見られたらわしは死んでしまうー","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to tear it up... If the fans see it, I'll die—"},{"lineNumber":254743,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、ハウゼル捕まえたら全て焼却していいから、いいから","translatedEnglishLine":"So when you catch Hauser, you can burn it all, it's fine, really."},{"lineNumber":254744,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスが言う、居る・・ここに来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos said, 'He's here... he's come here.'"},{ "lineNumber":254745,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはカオスを持って行列を調べてまわる","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance took Chaos and searched through the line."},{"lineNumber":254746,"originalJapaneseLine":"変装していたハウゼルを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"He found Hauser, who was in disguise."},{"lineNumber":254747,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・くそっ、卑怯なやっぱり罠なのかー","translatedEnglishLine":"...Damn, how underhanded, it's a trap after all—"},{"lineNumber":254748,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒った、焼き払ってくれる","translatedEnglishLine":"Angry, I'll burn you down."},{"lineNumber":254749,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘になる","translatedEnglishLine":"> Entering battle."},{"lineNumber":254750,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第１ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle - Turn 1."},{"lineNumber":254751,"originalJapaneseLine":"羽を広げて跳びまわろうとしたハウゼル・・どんと壁にぶつかる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauser tried to spread his wings and jump around... but bam, he crashed into the wall."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼルが持っていた本「ドラゴンパッチ６巻」と同じ本をサチコが持って来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sachiko brought the same book 'Dragon Patch Volume 6' that the demon Lord Saizel had.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １−６巻、全て・・オススメですよとランスに見せるが、いらん、おもんなさそう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She showed volumes 1 to 6 to Rance recommending them, but he said no thanks, it looks boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 漫画なら読むが字だけなんてめんどい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd read manga, but just text is too much hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなのどこがいいんだか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't see what's good about this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごくいいんです、ほんと最終巻がなかなか出ないのが辛い所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really good, it's just tough that the final volume hasn't been released yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファンの人だったら、どんな事をしても欲しいですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're a fan, you'd want it no matter what.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・魔人ハウゼルも欲しがるだろうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... I wonder if the demon Lord Hauser would want it too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ、もちろんです、あの人はマニアです、命を差し出しても欲しくなるはずですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, of course, he's a fanatic; he'd want it even if it cost his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という訳で俺様はここに来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that's why I have come here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっぱり分かりませんと　誰かが言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone said, 'I don't understand at all.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、そのドラゴンパッチを書いたドエススキーという作家が執筆活動か何かの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, the writer Doessky, who wrote Dragon Patch, is missing after going up this Hyper Building for some writing activity or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 為にこのハイパービルに登って行方不明になっているのだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He went up this Hyper Building and disappeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつを見つけ出して、続きを書かせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to find him and make him write the continuation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、それを読みたければ降伏しろと魔人ハウゼルを脅すのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then we threaten demon Lord Hauser to surrender if he wants to read it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなアホな・・とみんなバカにするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone scoffed, saying 'That's stupid...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコだけ、恐ろしい事を考える・・そんな事されたら従うしかないですよ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Sachiko thought something terrifying... If that happens, they'd have no choice but to obey...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the battle in the north.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図　リーザス１／合戦１　　現在地合戦マーカー：スケール前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map Lyzas 1 / Battle 1 - Current battle marker: In front of Scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大規模では無いが、小競り合い程度の戦いが続いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It isn't large-scale, but small skirmishes continued.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は用事があるからと今日は戦いに参加していない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and team didn't participate in the battle today, saying they had other matters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの為にきたのだあの男はと怒る兵士もいるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some soldiers were angry, asking, 'What did that man even come here for?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクスやハウレーンなどの戦い様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battles involving Ex and Haureen, among others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルのとある一室でドエススキーを発見した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doessky was found in a certain room in the Hyper Building.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この高い部屋から見る景色、これが創作意欲をわくのだーとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said the view from this high room inspires his creativity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもドエススキーもどちらも会った事を覚えていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neither Rance nor Doessky remembered meeting each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコだけは覚えている、なんで二人とも忘れるんですか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Sachiko remembered. 'Why did you both forget...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この続きをかけ、今すぐ、明日までに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Write the continuation, right now, by tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理じゃ、いきなり何をいう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impossible, what are you suddenly saying?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと読者は楽しみにしていただうが、こんな世界だ、もう続きはかけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sure, readers have been looking forward to it, but this is the world we live in; I can't write the rest anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに・・・実は、いろいろやりすぎて風呂敷が畳めないのじゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides... actually, I've done too much and can't wrap things up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶっちゃけ収拾が付かなくなったというか・・あははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, it's gotten out of control... haha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいからかけ、かかねば殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just write it, or I'll kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３日後、戦争中であるが読書家の間にとある噂が駆け巡った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three days later, even amid the war, a certain rumor spread among book lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ドラゴンパッチ７巻」最終巻が緊急発売
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Dragon Patch Volume 7' - the final volume - is released urgently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな時期なので、世界最後の本になるかもしれないが、作者ががんばって出版した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of these times, it might be the last book in the world, but the author worked hard to publish it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし大量生産は出来ずに限定２００冊、同人的な販売となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it can't be mass-produced; only 200 limited copies will be sold fan-style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月ＸＸ日、ＸＸＸＸにて作者自ら手渡しで販売。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On XX month XX day, it will be sold hand-to-hand by the author at XXXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場所は当然魔軍占領地でなくリーザス軍が管理化の奥地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The location was, of course, not in demon territory but deep inside territory controlled by the Lyzas army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数のリーザス兵が待ち構える洞窟の奥地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The back of a cave guarded by many Lyzas soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスも居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria and Maris were also there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルが来た時に捕まえる為に結界志木まで用意している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had even prepared barrier talismans to catch demon Lord Hauser if he came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、さすがに来ないだろうと指揮官達は言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the commanders said, 'He probably won't come.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに３００人ほどが行列していた、並んでいるマニア達は周囲に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 300 people were already in line, and the maniacs standing there looked around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵がいっぱいいて仰々しいのにびびる、何事だ・・何があるんだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're intimidated by the many Lyzas soldiers and the fuss around them. 'What's going on… what is this about...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、何があろうと欲しいー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no matter what, I want it—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドエススキー、落ち込んでいる・・・うう、書かされてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doessky was depressed... Ugh, I was forced to write it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理矢理・・あんなのわしの作品じゃない、駄作だ、駄作だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forced... That's not my work, it's a bad work, a bad work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破り捨てたい・・・ファンに見られたらわしは死んでしまうー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to tear it up... If the fans see it, I'll die—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、ハウゼル捕まえたら全て焼却していいから、いいから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So when you catch Hauser, you can burn it all, it's fine, really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが言う、居る・・ここに来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos said, 'He's here... he's come here.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはカオスを持って行列を調べてまわる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance took Chaos and searched through the line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変装していたハウゼルを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He found Hauser, who was in disguise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・くそっ、卑怯なやっぱり罠なのかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Damn, how underhanded, it's a trap after all—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒った、焼き払ってくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Angry, I'll burn you down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Entering battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第１ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 羽を広げて跳びまわろうとしたハウゼル・・どんと壁にぶつかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauser tried to spread his wings and jump around... but bam, he crashed into the wall.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I wonder if the demon Lord Hauser would want it too?"},{"lineNumber":254699,"originalJapaneseLine":"ええ、もちろんです、あの人はマニアです、命を差し出しても欲しくなるはずですね","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes, of course, he's a fanatic; he'd want it even if it cost his life."},{"lineNumber":254700,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"...."},{"lineNumber":254701,"originalJapaneseLine":"という訳で俺様はここに来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"And that's why I have come here."},{"lineNumber":254702,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっぱり分かりませんと　誰かが言う","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone said, 'I don't understand at all.'"},{ "lineNumber":254703,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、そのドラゴンパッチを書いたドエススキーという作家が執筆活動か何かの","translatedEnglishLine":"So, the writer Doessky, who wrote Dragon Patch, is missing after going up this Hyper Building for some writing activity or something."},{"lineNumber":254704,"originalJapaneseLine":"為にこのハイパービルに登って行方不明になっているのだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"He went up this Hyper Building and disappeared,"},{"lineNumber":254705,"originalJapaneseLine":"そいつを見つけ出して、続きを書かせる。","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to find him and make him write the continuation."},{"lineNumber":254706,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、それを読みたければ降伏しろと魔人ハウゼルを脅すのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then we threaten demon Lord Hauser to surrender if he wants to read it."},{"lineNumber":254707,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんなアホな・・とみんなバカにするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone scoffed, saying 'That's stupid...'"},{"lineNumber":254708,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコだけ、恐ろしい事を考える・・そんな事されたら従うしかないですよ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Only Sachiko thought something terrifying... If that happens, they'd have no choice but to obey..."},{"lineNumber":254709,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、北部の戦い","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, the battle in the north."},{"lineNumber":254710,"originalJapaneseLine":"地図　リーザス１／合戦１　　現在地合戦マーカー：スケール前","translatedEnglishLine":"Map Lyzas 1 / Battle 1 - Current battle marker: In front of Scale."},{"lineNumber":254711,"originalJapaneseLine":"大規模では無いが、小競り合い程度の戦いが続いている","translatedEnglishLine":"It isn't large-scale, but small skirmishes continued."},{"lineNumber":254712,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は用事があるからと今日は戦いに参加していない","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and team didn't participate in the battle today, saying they had other matters."},{"lineNumber":254713,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんの為にきたのだあの男はと怒る兵士もいるとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Some soldiers were angry, asking, 'What did that man even come here for?'"},{"lineNumber":254714,"originalJapaneseLine":"エクスやハウレーンなどの戦い様子","translatedEnglishLine":"The battles involving Ex and Haureen, among others."},{"lineNumber":254715,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービルのとある一室でドエススキーを発見した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Doessky was found in a certain room in the Hyper Building."},{"lineNumber":254716,"originalJapaneseLine":"この高い部屋から見る景色、これが創作意欲をわくのだーとか","translatedEnglishLine":"He said the view from this high room inspires his creativity."},{"lineNumber":254717,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスもドエススキーもどちらも会った事を覚えていない","translatedEnglishLine":"Neither Rance nor Doessky remembered meeting each other."},{"lineNumber":254718,"originalJapaneseLine":"サチコだけは覚えている、なんで二人とも忘れるんですか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Only Sachiko remembered. 'Why did you both forget...?'"},{"lineNumber":254719,"originalJapaneseLine":"この続きをかけ、今すぐ、明日までに","translatedEnglishLine":"Write the continuation, right now, by tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":254720,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理じゃ、いきなり何をいう","translatedEnglishLine":"Impossible, what are you suddenly saying?"},{"lineNumber":254721,"originalJapaneseLine":"きっと読者は楽しみにしていただうが、こんな世界だ、もう続きはかけない","translatedEnglishLine":"Sure, readers have been looking forward to it, but this is the world we live in; I can't write the rest anymore."},{"lineNumber":254722,"originalJapaneseLine":"それに・・・実は、いろいろやりすぎて風呂敷が畳めないのじゃ","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides... actually, I've done too much and can't wrap things up."},{"lineNumber":254723,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぶっちゃけ収拾が付かなくなったというか・・あははは","translatedEnglishLine":"Honestly, it's gotten out of control... haha."},{"lineNumber":254724,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいからかけ、かかねば殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"Just write it, or I'll kill you."},{"lineNumber":254725,"originalJapaneseLine":"３日後、戦争中であるが読書家の間にとある噂が駆け巡った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Three days later, even amid the war, a certain rumor spread among book lovers."},{"lineNumber":254726,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ドラゴンパッチ７巻」最終巻が緊急発売","translatedEnglishLine":"'Dragon Patch Volume 7' - the final volume - is released urgently."},{"lineNumber":254727,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな時期なので、世界最後の本になるかもしれないが、作者ががんばって出版した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because of these times, it might be the last book in the world, but the author worked hard to publish it."},{"lineNumber":254728,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただし大量生産は出来ずに限定２００冊、同人的な販売となる。","translatedEnglishLine":"However, it can't be mass-produced; only 200 limited copies will be sold fan-style."},{"lineNumber":254729,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＸＸ月ＸＸ日、ＸＸＸＸにて作者自ら手渡しで販売。","translatedEnglishLine":"On XX month XX day, it will be sold hand-to-hand by the author at XXXX."},{"lineNumber":254730,"originalJapaneseLine":"その日","translatedEnglishLine":"That day."},{"lineNumber":254731,"originalJapaneseLine":"場所は当然魔軍占領地でなくリーザス軍が管理化の奥地","translatedEnglishLine":"The location was, of course, not in demon territory but deep inside territory controlled by the Lyzas army."},{"lineNumber":254732,"originalJapaneseLine":"多数のリーザス兵が待ち構える洞窟の奥地","translatedEnglishLine":"The back of a cave guarded by many Lyzas soldiers."},{"lineNumber":254733,"originalJapaneseLine":"リア、マリスも居る","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria and Maris were also there."},{"lineNumber":254734,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ハウゼルが来た時に捕まえる為に結界志木まで用意している","translatedEnglishLine":"They had even prepared barrier talismans to catch demon Lord Hauser if he came."},{"lineNumber":254735,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、さすがに来ないだろうと指揮官達は言う","translatedEnglishLine":"But the commanders said, 'He probably won't come.'"},{ "lineNumber":254736,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでに３００人ほどが行列していた、並んでいるマニア達は周囲に","translatedEnglishLine":"About 300 people were already in line, and the maniacs standing there looked around."},{"lineNumber":254737,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス兵がいっぱいいて仰々しいのにびびる、何事だ・・何があるんだ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They're intimidated by the many Lyzas soldiers and the fuss around them. 'What's going on… what is this about...?'"},{"lineNumber":254738,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、何があろうと欲しいー","translatedEnglishLine":"But no matter what, I want it—"},{"lineNumber":254739,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254740,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドエススキー、落ち込んでいる・・・うう、書かされてしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"Doessky was depressed... Ugh, I was forced to write it."},{"lineNumber":254741,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理矢理・・あんなのわしの作品じゃない、駄作だ、駄作だ","translatedEnglishLine":"Forced... That's not my work, it's a bad work, a bad work."},{"lineNumber":254742,"originalJapaneseLine":"破り捨てたい・・・ファンに見られたらわしは死んでしまうー","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to tear it up... If the fans see it, I'll die—"},{"lineNumber":254743,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、ハウゼル捕まえたら全て焼却していいから、いいから","translatedEnglishLine":"So when you catch Hauser, you can burn it all, it's fine, really."},{"lineNumber":254744,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオスが言う、居る・・ここに来ている","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos said, 'He's here... he's come here.'"},{ "lineNumber":254745,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはカオスを持って行列を調べてまわる","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance took Chaos and searched through the line."},{"lineNumber":254746,"originalJapaneseLine":"変装していたハウゼルを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"He found Hauser, who was in disguise."},{"lineNumber":254747,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・くそっ、卑怯なやっぱり罠なのかー","translatedEnglishLine":"...Damn, how underhanded, it's a trap after all—"},{"lineNumber":254748,"originalJapaneseLine":"怒った、焼き払ってくれる","translatedEnglishLine":"Angry, I'll burn you down."},{"lineNumber":254749,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘になる","translatedEnglishLine":"> Entering battle."},{"lineNumber":254750,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第１ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Interrupt event during battle - Turn 1."},{"lineNumber":254751,"originalJapaneseLine":"羽を広げて跳びまわろうとしたハウゼル・・どんと壁にぶつかる","translatedEnglishLine":"Hauser tried to spread his wings and jump around... but bam, he crashed into the wall."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サイゼルが持っていた本「ドラゴンパッチ６巻」と同じ本をサチコが持って来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sachiko brought the same book 'Dragon Patch Volume 6' that the demon Lord Saizel had.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １−６巻、全て・・オススメですよとランスに見せるが、いらん、おもんなさそう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She showed volumes 1 to 6 to Rance recommending them, but he said no thanks, it looks boring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 漫画なら読むが字だけなんてめんどい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'd read manga, but just text is too much hassle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなのどこがいいんだか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't see what's good about this...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごくいいんです、ほんと最終巻がなかなか出ないのが辛い所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's really good, it's just tough that the final volume hasn't been released yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ファンの人だったら、どんな事をしても欲しいですよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're a fan, you'd want it no matter what.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむ・・魔人ハウゼルも欲しがるだろうか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... I wonder if the demon Lord Hauser would want it too?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ええ、もちろんです、あの人はマニアです、命を差し出しても欲しくなるはずですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, of course, he's a fanatic; he'd want it even if it cost his life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という訳で俺様はここに来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And that's why I have come here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっぱり分かりませんと　誰かが言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone said, 'I don't understand at all.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、そのドラゴンパッチを書いたドエススキーという作家が執筆活動か何かの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, the writer Doessky, who wrote Dragon Patch, is missing after going up this Hyper Building for some writing activity or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 為にこのハイパービルに登って行方不明になっているのだ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He went up this Hyper Building and disappeared,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつを見つけ出して、続きを書かせる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to find him and make him write the continuation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、それを読みたければ降伏しろと魔人ハウゼルを脅すのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then we threaten demon Lord Hauser to surrender if he wants to read it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなアホな・・とみんなバカにするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone scoffed, saying 'That's stupid...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコだけ、恐ろしい事を考える・・そんな事されたら従うしかないですよ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Sachiko thought something terrifying... If that happens, they'd have no choice but to obey...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、北部の戦い
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, the battle in the north.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図　リーザス１／合戦１　　現在地合戦マーカー：スケール前
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map Lyzas 1 / Battle 1 - Current battle marker: In front of Scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大規模では無いが、小競り合い程度の戦いが続いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It isn't large-scale, but small skirmishes continued.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は用事があるからと今日は戦いに参加していない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and team didn't participate in the battle today, saying they had other matters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの為にきたのだあの男はと怒る兵士もいるとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some soldiers were angry, asking, 'What did that man even come here for?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エクスやハウレーンなどの戦い様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battles involving Ex and Haureen, among others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルのとある一室でドエススキーを発見した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doessky was found in a certain room in the Hyper Building.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この高い部屋から見る景色、これが創作意欲をわくのだーとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He said the view from this high room inspires his creativity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスもドエススキーもどちらも会った事を覚えていない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Neither Rance nor Doessky remembered meeting each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サチコだけは覚えている、なんで二人とも忘れるんですか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only Sachiko remembered. 'Why did you both forget...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この続きをかけ、今すぐ、明日までに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Write the continuation, right now, by tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理じゃ、いきなり何をいう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Impossible, what are you suddenly saying?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっと読者は楽しみにしていただうが、こんな世界だ、もう続きはかけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sure, readers have been looking forward to it, but this is the world we live in; I can't write the rest anymore.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに・・・実は、いろいろやりすぎて風呂敷が畳めないのじゃ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Besides... actually, I've done too much and can't wrap things up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぶっちゃけ収拾が付かなくなったというか・・あははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Honestly, it's gotten out of control... haha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいからかけ、かかねば殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just write it, or I'll kill you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３日後、戦争中であるが読書家の間にとある噂が駆け巡った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three days later, even amid the war, a certain rumor spread among book lovers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ドラゴンパッチ７巻」最終巻が緊急発売
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Dragon Patch Volume 7' - the final volume - is released urgently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな時期なので、世界最後の本になるかもしれないが、作者ががんばって出版した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of these times, it might be the last book in the world, but the author worked hard to publish it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただし大量生産は出来ずに限定２００冊、同人的な販売となる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, it can't be mass-produced; only 200 limited copies will be sold fan-style.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＸＸ月ＸＸ日、ＸＸＸＸにて作者自ら手渡しで販売。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On XX month XX day, it will be sold hand-to-hand by the author at XXXX.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場所は当然魔軍占領地でなくリーザス軍が管理化の奥地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The location was, of course, not in demon territory but deep inside territory controlled by the Lyzas army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多数のリーザス兵が待ち構える洞窟の奥地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The back of a cave guarded by many Lyzas soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア、マリスも居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria and Maris were also there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ハウゼルが来た時に捕まえる為に結界志木まで用意している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They had even prepared barrier talismans to catch demon Lord Hauser if he came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、さすがに来ないだろうと指揮官達は言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the commanders said, 'He probably won't come.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでに３００人ほどが行列していた、並んでいるマニア達は周囲に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 300 people were already in line, and the maniacs standing there looked around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵がいっぱいいて仰々しいのにびびる、何事だ・・何があるんだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're intimidated by the many Lyzas soldiers and the fuss around them. 'What's going on… what is this about...?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、何があろうと欲しいー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But no matter what, I want it—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドエススキー、落ち込んでいる・・・うう、書かされてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doessky was depressed... Ugh, I was forced to write it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理矢理・・あんなのわしの作品じゃない、駄作だ、駄作だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forced... That's not my work, it's a bad work, a bad work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破り捨てたい・・・ファンに見られたらわしは死んでしまうー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to tear it up... If the fans see it, I'll die—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、ハウゼル捕まえたら全て焼却していいから、いいから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So when you catch Hauser, you can burn it all, it's fine, really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスが言う、居る・・ここに来ている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos said, 'He's here... he's come here.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはカオスを持って行列を調べてまわる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance took Chaos and searched through the line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変装していたハウゼルを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He found Hauser, who was in disguise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・くそっ、卑怯なやっぱり罠なのかー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Damn, how underhanded, it's a trap after all—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒った、焼き払ってくれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Angry, I'll burn you down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Entering battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の割り込みイベント　第１ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interrupt event during battle - Turn 1.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 羽を広げて跳びまわろうとしたハウゼル・・どんと壁にぶつかる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hauser tried to spread his wings and jump around... but bam, he crashed into the wall.
